about_the_game:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Player character
･Cirno

Partner character
･Cirno

Equipments
･Absolute Zero

Spell Cards
･Freeze Sign, "Perfect Freeze"
･Blowing Ice, "Ice Tornado"

[Attention]
Playable characters could be used from the start for those dungeons without story. They could also be used in dungeon with a story after it is cleared.
Partners could be used freely from the start.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
